greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions p of n such that no three points (i,p_i), (j,p_j), (k,p_k) are collinear, where p_i denotes the i-th part.
link: Fausto A. C. Cariboni, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300 (terms 0..150 from Alois P. Heinz)
maple: b:= proc(n, i, l) local j, k, m; m:= nops(l);
for j to m-2 do for k from j+1 to m-1 do
mathematica: Table[a[n], {n, 0, 40}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 21 2018, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _Joerg Arndt_ and _Alois P. Heinz_, Mar 02 2014
